## FlyoutButtonNavigationPolicy class

Set of rules controlling keyboard navigation from a flyout button.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FlyoutButtonNavigationPolicy implements INavigationPolicy<FlyoutButton> 
```
**Implements:** [INavigationPolicy](./blockly.inavigationpolicy_interface.md)<!-- -->&lt;[FlyoutButton](./blockly.flyoutbutton_class.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getFirstChild(\_current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy_class.getfirstchild_1_method.md) |  | Returns null since flyout buttons have no children. |
|  [getNextSibling(\_current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy_class.getnextsibling_1_method.md) |  | Returns null since inter-item navigation is done by FlyoutNavigationPolicy. |
|  [getParent(current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy_class.getparent_1_method.md) |  | Returns the parent workspace of the given flyout button. |
|  [getPreviousSibling(\_current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy_class.getprevioussibling_1_method.md) |  | Returns null since inter-item navigation is done by FlyoutNavigationPolicy. |
|  [isApplicable(current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy_class.isapplicable_1_method.md) |  | Returns whether the given object can be navigated from by this policy. |
|  [isNavigable(current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy_class.isnavigable_1_method.md) |  | Returns whether or not the given flyout button can be navigated to. |
